title: Exclusivity

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit a player. If their role is based on something from any other game, kill them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have Unstoppable defense against roles that your ability can kill.
- If anyone that you can kill visits you, kill them.
